doc:
James Stacy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Stacy 0 Maurice William Elias (December 23, 1936 – September 9, 2016), known professionally as James Stacy, was an American film and television actor. He is perhaps best-known for co-starring in the late 1960s TV western Lancer. In 1973, Stacy was hit by a drunk driver while driving his motorcycle, resulting in the amputation of his left leg and arm and the death of his girlfriend. He returned to acting in 1975 before retiring in 1992. He was convicted of child sex abuse in 1995 and served a six year prison sentence. Maurice_William_Elias ( December_23_,_1936 – September_9_,_2016 ) , known professionally as James_Stacy , was an_American_film_and_television_actor . He is perhaps best-known for co-starring in the_late_1960s_TV western_Lancer . In 1973 , Stacy was_hit by a_drunk_driver while driving his_motorcycle , resulting in the_amputation of his_left_leg and arm and the_death of his_girlfriend . He returned to acting in 1975 before retiring in 1992 . He was_convicted of child_sex_abuse in 1995 and served a_six_year_prison_sentence .
